sourcesContent:
<template>
    <CreateCRUD> :character="char" :createChar ="addNewCharacter" </CreateCRUD>
</template>

<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import CreateCRUD from '@/components/CreateCRUD.vue'
import {populatemyCharacters, getmyCharacters} from '../marvel.js'

export default {
  name: 'CreateView',
  components: {
    CreateCRUD
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
        char: []
      }
    },
  methods: {
        addNewCharacter(){
            this.$emit('input');
            console.log("addNewCharacter"); 
            let newId = parseInt(getmyCharacters()[0].id);
            newId += 1;
            console.log(newId)
            let charInfo = {id: newId, name: this.char.name, description: this.char.description };
            // this.char.push(sendData);
            this.char = charInfo;
            console.dir(this.char);
            //ver si poner un catch 
            populatemyCharacters(this.char);
            alert("Your new character has been created!");
            console.dir(getmyCharacters()); 
            this.char = {name: "", description: ""};    
        }
    },  
}
</script>
